00040 #include "openjpeg.h"

00043 /* 
00044  * Write Codestream index box (superbox)
00045  *
00046  * @param[in] offset    offset of j2k codestream
00047  * @param[in] cio       file output handle
00048  * @param[in] image     image data
00049  * @param[in] cstr_info codestream information
00050  * @param[in] j2klen    length of j2k codestream
00051  * @return              length of cidx box
00052  */
00053 int opj_write_cidx( int offset, opj_stream_private_t *cio, opj_codestream_info_t cstr_info, int j2klen,
00054               opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager );
00055 
00056 /* 
00057  * Check if EPH option is used
00058  *
00059  * @param[in] coff    offset of j2k codestream
00060  * @param[in] markers marker information
00061  * @param[in] marknum number of markers
00062  * @param[in] cio     file output handle
00063  * @return            true if EPH is used
00064  */
00065 OPJ_BOOL opj_check_EPHuse( int coff, opj_marker_info_t *markers, int marknum, opj_stream_private_t *cio,
00066               opj_event_mgr_t * p_manager );
